official-title.#text:
Relating to the consideration of House Report 113–415 and an accompanying resolution, and providing
			 for consideration of the resolution (H. Res. 565) calling on Attorney
			 General Eric H. Holder, Jr., to appoint a special counsel to investigate
			 the targeting of conservative nonprofit groups by the Internal Revenue
			 Service.
